review: Lack of youtube app.... the substitute app keeps buffering quite a bit., same with the official netflix app too. tested with other devices where youtube official app did not have the problem on the same bandwidth.May be the wireless reception / connectivity on fire tv stick needs to be improved.
author: Maverick

review: Love Amazon Fire Stick t.v.  With Amazon Prime, this is the greatest bargain going in the tech world.  My wife and I used to watch (and pay for) all the premium cable channels.  Now there is more than enough good choices for us to watch with this inexpensive and easy to use little device.  Got one for my son and he loves it too.  I have  a smart t.v.  My son does not.  Smart t.v. is not necessary to enjoy this.

review: Works great, easiest install I have ever seen.  I love it.  Getting one for every tv in the house.
